scripts.package:prod: cd dist && npm pkg set 'scripts'='a' && npm pkg delete 'scripts.0' && npm pkg delete 'devDependencies' && npm pkg set 'scripts.postinstall'='yarn prisma:generate && yarn prisma:deploy' && npm pkg set 'scripts.prisma:generate'='prisma generate' && npm pkg set 'scripts.prisma:deploy'='prisma migrate deploy' && npm pkg set 'dependencies.prisma'='^4.16.1'
